projects: [{"title":"Stock Market Analysis","start_date":"Nov 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"- Import Stock market data from Yahoo Finance using python and create a pipeline that normalize the data- Trained KMeans clustering algorithm to detect similar companies based on stock market movements"},{"title":"Engineering Design Optimization ","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"Guide by Prof. G.R Shevare Prof. Abhijit Gogulapati | Aerospace Engineering Department IIT Bombay- Researched various algorithms to optimize a Constrained Linear Cost-function with application to efficient thruster force management of a satellite.- Implemented Siedel’s LP and Simplex algorithm in Python and verified against various test inputs."},{"title":"Space Mission Design","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"- Gathered information regarding the space mission objectives, orbital/trajectory parameters, and launch vehicle- Described the overall mission and its status, including successes and failures for completed/ ongoing missions- Analysed burnout angle, velocity, height, mass (empty, payload) for various stages from python code"},{"title":"SMART LIGHT SENSOR CIRCUIT","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"- Designed a working model based upon the principle of automatic street lights.- Designed an electrical circuit for the same utilizing Transimpedance amplifier and comparator, on a breadboard.- Troubleshooted the circuit when LED didn’t go off, by reversing the polarity of the light sensor."},{"title":"DETERMINATION OF DRAG POLAR FROM FLIGHT TEST ","start_date":"Sep 2017","end_date":"Oct 2017","description":"Introduction to Flight|Prof.Rajkumar S.Pant- Calculate the required data from the flight test Data provided- Obtained the Plot of coefficient of drag versus coefficient of lift squared through Matlab program.- Determined parasite drag and Oswald efficiency factor using best straight-line approximation.- Approximation Drag Polar of the aircraft using Matlab andestimated maximum airspeed of the aircraft."},{"title":"FABRICATION OF GLIDER ","start_date":"Sep 2017","end_date":"Oct 2017","description":"Introduction to flight|Prof.Rajkumar S.Pant- Decided the Glider shape and material for two indoor gliders after many trials.- Fabricated two gliders as per these designs, optimizing one for maximum range and the other for maximum endurance."},{"title":"United States of America Elections’ Data Analysis","start_date":"Apr 2017","end_date":"May 2017","description":"Data analysis and Interpretation| Prof. Prabhu Ramchandran- Big Data Analysis of US Presidential Elections 2016May ’17- Analyzed the distribution of the votes in the regions of US using python pandas library.- Used the given data to see that which type of people voted whom like Black and white, literate and illiterate and also the state wise distribution."}]
